nodes.text: A Human male individual was onboard the Jendirian Valley in 22 BBY, while Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker and Senator Padmé Amidala were also present. He was most likely hard done by like most of the refugees aboard the Jendirian Valley. While Aboard the Jendirian Valley, the Human wore an extravagant robe of brown and orange, with a hood and two horn-like protrusions.
